LanguageData.PR.RandomizeFaceAndHairAssetsInPlaceOfMi: Randomize face and hair assets in place of missing assets
LanguageData.PR.ShowPortraitsByDefault: Portraits show by default (Toggling this in the main menu may reset all individual portrait show/hide settings)
LanguageData.PR.NoExpressableTraitRandom: Reroll random face (No expressable trait found on pawn)
